TopicTitle: How do I add an image to my signature?

Articles.Content:
Hi KSP colleagues,

I am trying to add an image to my signature.  In the edit-profile area, I see the place where it says to insert an image from a URL.  What I need, however, is to load an image from my computer.  So I need to be able to browse my computer.

Could someone please explain how to do this.

Thank you.

Stanley

I use Cubeupload. It works well for me. You just upload an image from your computer and it makes a URL for it that you can copy. Other people use things like Imgur, but I think Cubeupload is better. You do need to create an account, but if I remember right it is not much trouble to do so.

Hi Ben J. Kerman,

OK.  Thank you for this information.

Stanley
